body.name: Queen Size Metal Bed Frame 7 Inch Bed Frame for Box Spring and Mattress 9-Leg Heavy Duty Bedframe Tool-Free Easy Assembly Sturdy Box Spring Base Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 17 hrs 14 mins
features: STURDY & RELIABLE - DTIG queen bed frame features steel construction give 3000 lbs support for box spring and mattress set. PLEASE NOTE THIS QUEEN BED FRAME WITH THE USE OF BOX SPRING (NOT INCLUDED)

UPGRADED BED FRAME DESIGN - This queen size bed frame designed with 9-leg support for maximum stability and plastic gasket end for noise-free using and floor protection. Ensure your excellent sleep quality every night.

HEADBOARD COMPATIBLE - Brackets are included with this queen bed frame to make attaching a headboard simple and easy but please note extra hardware for attachment is not included. Please match the size of the reserved holes to purchase screws.

EASY ASSEMBLY & MOVE - The integrated compact design bed frame queen size can be set up within 10 minutes. The whole process can be assembled with only your hands without tools and other people's help. Both assembly and disassembly of DTIG queen metal bed frame are extremely easy and quick.
5 YEAR WARRANTY - If you have any questions with this black bed frame queen please feel free to contact us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful Bed Frame
reviews.reviewText: I want to start by saying this frame is impressive. For the price, I was expecting low quality metal and parts not aligning. To my surprise, this bed arrived in perfect condition with all parts working together. I am really surprised there are not more reviews about this product. I have been recommending this to my family and friends because the product is phenomenal.With my experience, I wasn't missing any legs and the package was sealed. When I started the assembly, each piece matched perfectly to the next. When I inserted the slats across the frame, some were tight and others were loose. Then some were perfect to fit. We set up the frame and tested the mattress we already had. It worked great with a 10" spring mattress. I wanted to test it before we moved so I knew if I needed a new mattress to accommodate the frame.We moved 14 days after setting up the frame. I took all the pieces apart and assembled again in our new home. This is when I found the slats working better. Before, we started at the bottom and worked to the top. This time, we started in the middle and evenly placed the slats from the middle out. We put some going to the top and then going to the bottom, alternating. I found the slats were easier to install. We didn't have the tightness as before. After assembly, it was just as fabulous as before. As for assembly, it is pretty straightforward with how it goes together. If you are not handy with tools, this will be a simple project. There is nothing complicated once you lay out all the pieces. Then you can put it together.What we like about the frame is the height of 7 inches. It gives some space under the bed for our rolling flat totes. It also allows a great height when adding out 10 inch mattress. The frame is really sturdy for two adults to be comfortable. I don't hear any squeaks and I think the 9 legs help with this. We are about 400 pounds of combined weight.With all the pros, there is always something negative to mention. The only thing we do not like about the frame would be the protectors for the 9 legs. We were able to purchase some slip covers for the legs with a non-slip bottom to keep the bed from sliding and damaging our floors. I do wish they would consider some protective boots that would go around the bottom of the legs. This seems to be an oversight with bed frame manufacturers. Our previous bed frame made of wood had sticker type things to go on the bottom of the legs. They never work and we always have to adapt to the sliding and floor damages. Even the plastic on this frame will not prevent it from sliding. This was an easy fix for us and if you have carpet flooring it wouldn't be an issue.Final thought for anyone considering a budget friendly platform frame is to jump on this product. You will be pleasantly surprised by the high quality and durability.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly well made
reviews.reviewText: I always have low expectations of cheap stuff from China. Fortunately in this case my low expectations were exceeded. The frame comes in a compact, heavy package. Despite having obviously been dropped (one end of the box was split open), nothing was damaged due to the well-engineered packing system.Assembly is trivially easy, all the parts are clearly labeled and the one-page pictoral instructions are simple to follow.The queen frame has nine legs, one at each joint. The legs each have a bolt at the top that screws into the joint from below, locking everything together. Mattress width is adjustable by a few inches, but at the smallest position the frame is the correct size for a standard 60" queen mattress. The intermediate supports are friction fit into pockets in the rails. It's a clever design, all going together without any tools or loose hardware.The head end has brackets that will allow a headboard to be attached. You'll have to supply your own hardware and headboard if you decide to do that.The frame is metal, with the exception of the feet and some washers that go between the legs and frame. All metal is covered with a black powder coat finish that appears durable.I chose this frame because it appeared well designed and had more intermediate supports than some of the others available at this price. Also because it has short (~1") raised metal pieces at each corner and in the middle of the outside rails to keep the mattress from slipping out of place. These will make rotating my heavy af latex mattress a little more annoying, but there's not much that can be done about that.For less than a hundred bucks it's hard to see how you could do any better. If you're looking for a low, unobtrusive platform frame, this one fits the bill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy setup solid construction
reviews.reviewText: We put our new tempurpedic mattress and box spring on our old frame and something was wrong. The old frame was weak and made the new bed like a trampoline. Bingo, this new frame was solid and set up in 15 minutes. Great price and well constructed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble, feels very sturdy so far (haven't slept on it yet) but definitely an improvement from what we were sleeping on before. No noise, squeak, or creek. If you catch it on sale, grab it! Worth the buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like that the bed frame is sturdy and easy to assemble. i also like that I can adjust the size of the bed frame!

Me gustó mucho. No es alta. Es muy fácil de armar y de mover. Es completamente silenciosa. A mi esposa y a mí nos ha gustado muchísimo. Hay modelos más baratos pero en verdad que esté vale mucho la pena. ¡Cómprenla!
